title: Beautifully Remodeled 2 Bedroom Duplex, Just a Block from the Ocean!!
posting_body: ['Beautifully Remodeled 2 Bedroom Duplex, Just a Block from the Ocean!!', 'Property Address', '1118 E. 1st St. | Long Beach, CA 90802', 'Offered By', 'Ernst and Haas Management Co.', 'Description', 'Now Leasing!!', 'A beautifully upgraded 2 bedroom 1 bath duplex unit in a prime Alamitos Beach Location, just a block from the Ocean.', '1118 E 1st st is an early 20th-century garden walk-up building featuring fresh paint, updated landscaping, gated entry, and an on-site laundry room.', ' Garages and off-street parking (subject to availability, extra charge)', 'The interior of this lovely unit opens to a spacious main living room, painted in a bright, modern color scheme and boasting fresh laminate flooring, blinds, and ceiling fan and connects to an open-concept kitchen with freshly installed kitchen cabinets, counters, fixtures, and pendant lighting.', ' The floor plan includes 2 nicely sized bedrooms, each with fresh flooring and blinds, and connecting to a remodeled bathroom.', 'Other features include Air conditioning, and water is included.', 'This property is equipped with a code box and can be viewed via a scheduled self-guided tour.', 'For more information on this or any other available property, please contact Ernst & Haas Management at', 'show contact info', ', or visit us online at <URL> and apply today.', 'TO QUALIFY:', '• Credit score must be no less than 600', '• Monthly gross income to qualify must be 2 ½ times the rent', '• We do not accept past evictions, judgments, or collections from a management company or landlord', '• Renter’s Insurance is required.', 'Proof of coverage must be provided upon the signing of your lease.', '*Note - See selection criteria for a detailed list of qualifications on our website at <URL>', 'PLEASE BE AWARE OF RENTAL SCAMS:', 'We caution all applicants to be diligent in researching the legitimacy of any potential rental listing.', 'All deposits, rents, and rental agreements are ONLY executed at Ernst & Haas Management, 4120 Atlantic Ave., Long Beach, CA.', 'If you are being asked to fill out a third-party application, or if you are being asked to pay cash or send money via an App, Western Union, Money-Gram or Prepaid Visa card, STOP these are signs of rental listing scams used to defraud applicants.', 'Ernst and Haas Management Co.', 'DRE License #01251870', '*ALL INFORMATION DEEMED ACCURATE BUT NOT GUARANTEED.', 'APPLIANCES ARE PROVIDED AS A COURTESY AND ARE NOT MANDATORY TO THE LEASE.', 'TERMS ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE WITHOUT NOTICE.', 'Amenities', 'Stove', 'Microwave Oven', 'On-Site Laundry Facilities', 'Water Paid', 'Garages Subject to Availability - Extra Charge', 'Gated Entry', 'Laminate Floors', 'Wall A/C', 'Blinds', 'Sorry No Pets', 'Details', 'Beds/Baths: 2BD/1.0BA', 'Square Feet: 800', 'Rental Terms', 'Rent: $2,395.00', 'Application Fee: $45.00', 'Security Deposit: $2,400.00', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats not allowed', 'Dogs not allowed']
